title: Wood Ideas & Design Inspiration
description: Explore trending color combinations, room ideas, and professional design tips

sereneSanctuary.name: Serene Sanctuary
sereneSanctuary.description: Calming blues and soft whites create a peaceful retreat

warmEarthTones.name: Warm Earth Tones
warmEarthTones.description: Rich terracotta and warm beiges for a cozy atmosphere

freshKitchenGreens.name: Fresh Kitchen Greens
freshKitchenGreens.description: Sage and mint greens with crisp white accents

boldStatementWall.name: Bold Statement Wall
boldStatementWall.description: Deep navy creates drama with gold accents

spaLikeBathroom.name: Spa-Like Bathroom
spaLikeBathroom.description: Soft grays and whites for a clean, relaxing feel

cozyHomeOffice.name: Cozy Home Office
cozyHomeOffice.description: Warm grays with pops of energizing orange

trending.title: 2024 Color Trends
trending.description: Discover the colors shaping interior design this year

warmNeutrals.title: Warm Neutrals
warmNeutrals.description: Cozy beiges and soft browns create inviting spaces

boldJewelTones.title: Bold Jewel Tones
boldJewelTones.description: Rich emeralds and sapphires make dramatic statements

softPastels.title: Soft Pastels
softPastels.description: Gentle hues perfect for creating calm, peaceful environments

schemes.title: Curated Color Schemes
schemes.description: Professional color combinations for every style

monochromaticBlues.name: Monochromatic Blues
monochromaticBlues.description: Various shades of blue create depth and sophistication

complementaryContrast.name: Complementary Contrast
complementaryContrast.description: Orange and green opposites create vibrant energy

analogousHarmony.name: Analogous Harmony
analogousHarmony.description: Adjacent colors on the wheel for natural flow

triadicBalance.name: Triadic Balance
triadicBalance.description: Three evenly spaced colors create dynamic balance

splitComplementary.name: Split Complementary
splitComplementary.description: Base color with two adjacent to its complement

tetradicSquare.name: Tetradic Square
tetradicSquare.description: Four colors forming a square on the color wheel

rule60-30-10.title: The 60-30-10 Rule
rule60-30-10.description: Use 60% dominant color, 30% secondary color, and 10% accent color for balanced rooms.

testColors.title: Test Colors in Different Light
testColors.description: Wood large swatches and observe them throughout the day in various lighting conditions.

considerFunction.title: Consider Room Function
considerFunction.description: Choose energizing colors for workspaces and calming tones for bedrooms.

choosingFinish.title: Choosing the Right Finish
choosingFinish.content: Flat finishes hide imperfections but are harder to clean. Satin and eggshell are great for most rooms. Semi-gloss works well in kitchens and bathrooms.

primerEssential.title: Primer is Essential
primerEssential.content: Always use primer when changing colors dramatically, wooding over dark colors, or wooding new drywall. It ensures better coverage and color accuracy.

qualityTools.title: Quality Tools Matter
qualityTools.content: Invest in high-quality brushes and rollers. They hold more wood, provide smoother application, and leave fewer marks.

planColorFlow.title: Plan Your Color Flow
planColorFlow.content: Consider how colors flow from room to room. Use a consistent color palette throughout your home for cohesive design.
